blog.name: oimatchstickman
blog.title: Manic Pixie Dream Doctors
blog.description:
A cosplayer, seamstress, and retail worker who has many fictional interests such as: Doctor Who, Phantom of the Opera, Star Trek, Marvel, Portal, Disney, Pixar, Phineas and Ferb, M*A*S*H, Les Miserables, Into the Woods, and any other fandom I feel like.

But mostly Doctor Who.

I like all the Doctor Who I've seen- including Moffat's era- and no hate is tolerated. At all. Let me and others enjoy our show without constantly picking at the smallest thing thanks.

tags: where did he get that hair?
because I still see people referring to richard's hair as a wig occasionally
and bless his heart that was not a wig
at least during the original run
to be fair I do think the extensions looked better than the wig
but I prefer short-haired David to long-haired David
so I really appreciated that he could look more like his normal self during his stay in NY
but I really do appreciate his dedication to his art too
(and I'm thankful that they didn't touch his eyebrows during the NY run either)
I may do more of these
(I'm looking at you St. Trinian's hair)
or I may not if no one likes this kind of stuff
I saw the play in Stratford and it was glorious!!

tags: turns out I like the voice but don't care that much for his talk with olivia colman
summary: Out on your podcast provider now. The first episode features Olivia Colman. On the teaser there were amongst others Whoopi...
caption:
Out on your podcast provider now. The first episode features Olivia Colman. On the teaser there were amongst others Whoopi Goldberg, Sir Ian McKellan, Samantha Bee, Jodie Whittaker, and Michael Sheen.

Just know, I’ll be listening to his Scottish accent and that voice religiously.

reblog.comment:
Out on your podcast provider now. The first episode features Olivia Colman. On the teaser there were amongst others Whoopi Goldberg, Sir Ian McKellan, Samantha Bee, Jodie Whittaker, and Michael Sheen.
